name: glusterfs
description: GlusterFS is a scalable network filesystem. Using common off-the-shelf hardware, you can create large, distributed storage solutions for media streaming, data analysis, and other data- and bandwidth-intensive tasks. GlusterFS is free and open source software.
preInstallNotes:
WARNING: GlusterFS on DCOS is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

GlusterFS requires a working ETCD to work. Consider using the DC/OS etcd package for creating it.
